flawed_nl_solution:
Each tree A gives her six good oranges a month 10 x 0.6 = <<10*0.6=6>>6
Each tree B gives her five good oranges a month because 15 x (1/3) = <<15*(1/3)=5>>5
On average, a tree gives her 55 oranges a month because 0.5(6) + 0.5(5) = 55
She has ten total trees because 55 / 55 = <<55/55=1>>1
#### 1

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5.5, not 55. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
